create or replace TABLE INDICATORS_DATA (
	"country_name" VARCHAR(16777216),

	"indicator_name" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"indicator_code" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"value" FLOAT,
	"year" NUMBER(38,0)
);
